resources.string: Orion Viewer is open source project and you can help do it better!
There are many thing that you can bring to the project:
\u2022 suggest a feature or report a problem into the issue tracker
\u2022 translate application to other languages or improve an existing translation
\u2022 implement new feature or fix a bug
\u2022 design new application theme or/and new UI/UX
\u2022 write an application review on Google Play or any other platform
Help to make the application better - participate in the survey about it! (10â€“20 minutes)
